title: What Causes a Failure to Send or Receive a Multimedia Message? How Can I Solve the Problem?
answer:
Multimedia messages cannot be received if your phone's available storage space is
insufficient.
To solve the problem, delete unnecessary files to increase your phone's storage space.

 

 

Multimedia messages cannot be sent or received if data services are disabled.
To solve the problem, touch > Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile
networks, and select Data enabled.
